short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 使用我们的插件，您可以在temu卖家后台清除堆积如山的弹窗，一键自动上架，多店铺切换铺货，自动加入发货台
short.en: With our plugin, you can clear the piles of pop-ups in the temu seller backend, automatically add to the delivery platform,…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
👉 Temu™卖家后台助手，是一款专为temu卖家后台设计的便捷工具。它拥有几大强力的功能：自动抢发货台、一键清除弹窗、一键自动上架
💻 插件直接在您的浏览器中运行，无需下载或安装额外软件。即使没有编程技能，您也可以轻松使用这款插件，提升您的工作效率。
特色💡💡💡 
Temu™卖家后台助手插件提供以下特色功能：
  * 在temu卖家后台页面注入工具按钮；
  * 自动抢发货台；
  * 一键清除堆积如山的弹窗；
  * 一键自动上架，多店铺切换铺货；
  * 帮助您提升工作效率。
🔔 如何开始使用？ 
1、安装插件并访问temu卖家后台； 
2、点击注入的工具按钮；
3、点击移除通知按钮，一键清除弹窗
4、点击采集箱按钮，查看新建的商品信息，如果采集箱中没有商品信息，需要用户前往新建商品页面创建一批商品，插件会保存用户新建的商品信息到采集箱，用于后续自动上架商品。
5、在我的备货单页面，通过点击自动加入发货台按钮，开始自动抢发货台
感谢您选择Temu™卖家后台助手插件，让我们一起提升工作效率！
long.en:
👉 Temu™ Seller Assistant is a convenient tool designed for temu sellers. It has two powerful functions: automatically add to the delivery platform and one-click clear pop-up window and one-click automatic listing
💻 The plug-in runs directly in your browser, without downloading or installing additional software. Even without programming skills, you can easily use this plug-in to improve your work efficiency.
Features💡💡💡 
Temu™ Seller Assistant Plugin provides the following features
  * Inject tool button on temu seller backend page；
  * automatically add to the delivery platform;
  * Clear the piles of pop-ups with one click；
  * One-click automatic listing, switching between multiple stores；
  * Help you improve work efficiency。
🔔 How to start using it?
1. Install the plug-in and access the temu seller backend;
2. Click the injected tool button;
3. Click the Remove Notification button to clear the pop-up window with one click
4. Click the collection box button to view the newly created product information. If there is no product information in the collection box, the user needs to go to the new product page to create a batch of products. The plug-in will save the user's newly created product information to the collection box for subsequent automatic listing of products.
5. On the My Stock List page, click the Automatically Add to Shipment button to start automatically adding to the shipment.
Thank you for choosing the Temu™ Seller Backend Assistant plugin. Let us improve our work efficiency together!
